sermons.title: Snares, Traps, Scourges, And Thorns
sermons.description: If you have been walking with God and experienced the deliverance of God, and he has driven out strongholds, and you love God, what power of the enemy can stand before you? Israel was warned to take heed and love God, and not to go back to the gods of the nations. The enemy has laid traps and snares before God's people to trip them up, and walking close to God is the only way to recognize and avoid them.
